name: Visiting Hours
description: This data type contains the hours when a patient location is open for visiting. Refer to HL7 Table 0267 - Days of the week for valid values for the first two components.

fields.name: Start Day Range
fields.description: Starting day of visiting hours range. See HL7 Table 0267 - Days of the week for valid values.

fields.name: End Day Range
fields.description: Ending day of visiting hours range. Starting day of visiting hours range. See HL7 Table 0267 - Days of the week for valid values

fields.name: Start Hour Range
fields.description: Starting hour on starting day of visiting hours range (see first component, 2.9.49.1, Start day range (ID)).

fields.name: End Hour Range
fields.description: Ending hour on ending day of visiting hours range (see second component, 2.9.49.2, End day range (ID)).
